quotes.message: Prejudice is a burden that confuses the past, threatens the future and renders the present inaccessible.
quotes.name: Maya Angelou

quotes.message: Prejudice is a learned trait. You're not born prejudiced; you're taught it.
quotes.name: Charles R. Swindoll

quotes.message: Prejudice is a chain, it can hold you. If you prejudice, you can't move, you keep prejudice for years. Never get nowhere with that.
quotes.name: Bob Marley

quotes.message: Prejudice is like a hair across your cheek. You can't see it, you can't find it with your fingers, but you keep brushing at it because the feel of it is irritating.
quotes.name: Marian Anderson

quotes.message: Bias and prejudice are attitudes to be kept in hand, not attitudes to be avoided.
quotes.name: Charles Curtis

quotes.message: Prejudice is a raft onto which the shipwrecked mind clambers and paddles to safety.
quotes.name: Ben Hecht

quotes.message: Prejudice is the child of ignorance.
quotes.name: William Hazlitt

quotes.message: Prejudice - a vagrant opinion without visible means of support.
quotes.name: Ambrose Bierce

quotes.message: Bigotry or prejudice in any form is more than a problem; it is a deep-seated evil within our society.
quotes.name: Judith Light

quotes.message: Preconceived notions are the locks on the door to wisdom.
quotes.name: Merry Browne

quotes.message: Judgments prevent us from seeing the good that lies beyond appearances.
quotes.name: Wayne W. Dyer

quotes.message: Our thoughts are unseen hands shaping the people we meet. Whatever we truly think them to be, that's what they'll become for us.
quotes.name: Richard Cowper

quotes.message: Prejudices subsist in people's imagination long after they have been destroyed by their experience.
quotes.name: Ernest Dimnet

quotes.message: If you judge people you have no time to love them.
quotes.name: Mother Teresa

quotes.message: Prejudices, it is well known, are most difficult to eradicate from the heart whose soil has never been loosened or fertilised by education: they grow there, firm as weeds among stones.
quotes.name: Charlotte Bronte

quotes.message: Prejudice is the glass through which most things are seen and judged.
quotes.name: Edward Counsel

quotes.message: All prejudices are obstinate, like diseases of chronic tenacity, and require radical cures.
quotes.name: Norman Macdonald

quotes.message: Prejudice is the sole author of infamies: how many acts are so qualified by an opinion forged out of naught but prejudice!
quotes.name: Marquis De Sade

quotes.message: Prejudice squints when it looks and lies when it talks.
quotes.name: Duchess d'Abrantes

quotes.message: Prejudices are what fools use for reason.
quotes.name: Voltaire

quotes.message: Two things reduce prejudice: education and laughter.
quotes.name: Laurence J. Peter

quotes.message: Race prejudice can't be talked down, it must be lived down.
quotes.name: Francis J. Grimke

quotes.message: Prejudice not being funded on reason cannot be removed by argument.
quotes.name: Samuel Johnson

quotes.message: Sometimes we feel the loss of a prejudice as a loss of vigor.
quotes.name: Eric Hoffer

quotes.message: Prejudice cannot see the things that are because it is always looking for things that aren't.
quotes.name: Mark Twain

quotes.message: Prejudices are the chains forged by ignorance to keep men apart.
quotes.name: Marguerite Gardiner

quotes.message: Prejudice is opinion without judgement.
quotes.name: Voltaire

quotes.message: Our prejudices are our robbers, they rob us valuable things in life.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: There is no prejudice so strong as that which arises from a fancied exemption from all prejudice.
quotes.name: William Hazlitt

quotes.message: Our prejudices are like physical infirmities - we cannot do what they prevent us from doing.
quotes.name: John Lancaster Spalding

quotes.message: Prejudice is being down on something you're not up on.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: I think people always believe what they want to believe, don't you?
quotes.name: Lillian Hellman

quotes.message: Too many of our prejudices are like pyramids upside down. They rest on tiny, trivial incidents, but they spread upward and outward until they fill our minds.
quotes.name: William McChesney Martin

quotes.message: Bigotry is the sacred disease.
quotes.name: Heraclitus

quotes.message: Bigotry tries to keep truth safe in its hand
quotes.name: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.message: Prejudice assumes the garb of reason, but the cheat is too thin.
quotes.name: Henry Wheeler Shaw

quotes.message: The prejudices of men emanate from the mind, and may be overcome; the prejudices of women emanate from the heart and are impregnable.
quotes.name: Jean Baptiste de Boyer

quotes.message: Beware prejudices. They are like rats, and men's minds are like traps; prejudices get in easily, but it is doubtful if they ever get out.
quotes.name: Lord Jeffrey

quotes.message: When we destroy an old prejudice, we have need of a new virtue.
quotes.name: Madame De Stael

quotes.message: Prejudices are the props of civilization.
quotes.name: Andre Gide

quotes.message: Prejudices are what rule the vulgar crowd.
quotes.name: Voltaire

quotes.message: Prejudice is the twin of illiberality.
quotes.name: G. D. Prentice

quotes.message: Prejudice is never easy unless it can pass itself off for reason.
quotes.name: William Hazlitt

quotes.message: Prejudice, which sees what it pleases, cannot see what is plain.
quotes.name: Aubrey de Vere

quotes.message: Rigid judgmental opinions can block descent of Spirit's pinions.
quotes.name: Saiom Shriver

quotes.message: Prejudice is a house-plant which is very apt to wilt if you take it out-of-doors among folks.
quotes.name: H. W. SHAW

quotes.message: Prejudice is an equivocal term; and may as well mean right opinions taken upon trust and deeply rooted in the mind, as false and absurd opinions so derived, and grown into it.
quotes.name: Richard Hurd

quotes.message: Prejudice is a mist, which in our journey through the world often dims the brightest and obscures the best of all the good and glorious objects that meet us on our way.
quotes.name: Shaftesbury
